title: Choose the tools
body: Now that you’ve been introduced to the power tools, it’s over to you for a challenge. Meet Kirstie. She’s just approached you in store in the timber aisle. She says she’s redecorating her lounge and wants to sand the old floor and fix some damaged boards. Being a novice DIYer, she wonders if any power tools might make her job easier. Can you help point her in the right direction?
instruction: Select three tools to help Kirstie, and then select Submit.

_feedback.correct:
That’s right. A belt sander is ideal for stripping wood, while drill drivers are great for putting in screws. Kirstie might also like to use a screwdriver as they’re designed to take the manual work out of repetitive screwdriving, and they can be used on a slow speed setting. Perfect for a novice DIYer like Kirstie.
